definition.procedurexml: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?><xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block deletable="false" type="event_trigger" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">entity_attacked</field><next><block type="controls_if"><value name="IF0"><block type="compare_mcitems"><value name="a"><block type="entity_get_use_item"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"/></value></block></value><value name="b"><block type="mcitem_all"><field name="value">Items.SHIELD</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="cancel_event"><next><block type="play_sound"><field name="sound">item.shield.block</field><field name="soundcategory">neutral</field><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"/></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"/></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"/></value><value name="level"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value><value name="pitch"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value><next><block type="item_cooldown_for"><value name="item"><block type="entity_get_use_item"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"/></value></block></value><value name="ticks"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">60</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"/></value><next><block type="item_damage"><value name="amount"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value><value name="item"><block type="entity_get_use_item"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"/></value></block></value></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></statement></block></next></block></xml>
